reels-packages.question: How long does filming take?
reels-packages.answer: A single filming day takes about 6 hours. During that time, we capture material for 3-8 Reels videos.

reels-packages.question: Do I need to have scripts ready?
reels-packages.answer: No! In the Growth and Dominance packages, script creation is included. Together we'll brainstorm topics that will engage your audience.

reels-packages.question: How quickly will I receive the finished videos?
reels-packages.answer: Initial previews are usually within 3-5 days. Final version after your feedback.

reels-packages.question: Can I use the videos on other networks?
reels-packages.answer: Yes! Vertical videos (9:16) work great on Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and LinkedIn.

creative-production.question: How much does a commercial spot cost?
creative-production.answer: It depends on the scope of the project. Basic spot from £950, complex production with actors and locations from £1,800. I'll always give you the price upfront.

creative-production.question: How long does production take?
creative-production.answer: From the first call to the final video usually 2-4 weeks. It depends on the complexity of the project.

creative-production.question: Do you provide actors and locations?
creative-production.answer: Yes, I can provide complete production including casting, locations, and equipment.

creative-production.question: Can you film a TV commercial?
creative-production.answer: Yes, for large projects I collaborate with SocialVids, who have experience with TV commercials.

event-video.question: Do you film outside of London?
event-video.answer: Yes, I film across the UK and internationally (primarily Prague).

event-video.question: How quickly will I receive the event video?
event-video.answer: I offer express delivery - short clips for social media the same evening, complete aftermovie within 5-7 days.

event-video.question: Do I need more videographers?
event-video.answer: For smaller events, I am enough. For large events, I can provide a full team.

event-video.question: Does the price include drone footage?
event-video.answer: Drone footage is for an extra fee. We'll discuss this during the consultation.

live-stream.question: What connection do we need?
live-stream.answer: Ideally a stable internet connection with at least 10 Mbps upload. I can also provide a backup 4G/5G connection.

live-stream.question: Where can we broadcast?
live-stream.answer: YouTube, Facebook, LinkedIn, Zoom, or your own platform. We can broadcast to multiple platforms simultaneously.

live-stream.question: What if the internet fails?
live-stream.answer: I always have a backup connection and local recording. Even if the stream drops, the video is not lost.

live-stream.question: How many cameras do you use?
live-stream.answer: It depends on the project. Basic setup = 2 cameras, for large conferences up to 4-5 cameras + vision mixer.

post-production.question: Can you edit my own footage?
post-production.answer: Yes! Send me your material and I'll turn it into a professional video.

post-production.question: How long does editing take?
post-production.answer: It depends on the length and complexity. A short Reels video (60s) = 1-2 days. A longer video (5-10 min) = 3-5 days.

post-production.question: Does the price include music?
post-production.answer: Yes, I use licensed music from libraries I subscribe to. If you want a specific song, we can purchase it.

post-production.question: How many revisions do I get?
post-production.answer: Usually 2 rounds of revisions. If you need more, we can agree on it.

voiceover.question: How quickly will I receive the recording?
voiceover.answer: I deliver most orders within 24 hours. If it's urgent, I can even do it within a few hours.

voiceover.question: Can I hear samples?
voiceover.answer: Yes! On this page you will find audio samples from my projects (Prazdroj, ČSOB, Oreo).

voiceover.question: What formats do you deliver?
voiceover.answer: MP3, WAV, or any format you need. Always in high quality.

voiceover.question: Can you do dubbing too?
voiceover.answer: Yes, I also do dubbing for videos, e-learning courses, or animations.

ugc.question: How much does one UGC video cost?
ugc.answer: The price depends on the length, number of videos (packages are more cost-effective), and production requirements. Contact me for a price list.

ugc.question: Do I need to send the product?
ugc.answer: Yes, for an authentic video, I need to have the product physically with me. I can send it back after filming.

ugc.question: How soon will the video be ready?
ugc.answer: I typically deliver the first preview within 3-5 business days after receiving the product.

ugc.question: Does the price include advertising rights?
ugc.answer: Yes, the price usually includes rights for use in ads (Usage Rights) for 12 months.

international-event-video.question: Do you charge extra for travel?
international-event-video.answer: No hidden fees. All travel costs (flights, hotel, meals) are included in the quoted price upfront.

international-event-video.question: How far in advance should I book?
international-event-video.answer: For international events, we recommend 4-6 weeks. Rush bookings possible subject to availability.

international-event-video.question: Do you have insurance for international work?
international-event-video.answer: Yes, I carry liability insurance valid across the EU. I can provide a certificate on request.

international-event-video.question: What if our event is in multiple cities?
international-event-video.answer: I offer bundle discounts for multi-city tours. 3+ cities = 15% discount. Get in touch for a custom quote.

international-event-video.question: Can you handle livestreaming internationally?
international-event-video.answer: Yes, I can livestream from any location with stable internet. A test stream is always done in advance.

international-event-video.question: What equipment do you travel with?
international-event-video.answer: Professional cinema cameras, wireless audio, LED lights, and gimbals. All packed in carry-on luggage for reliability — no checked baggage risks.

international-event-video.question: What if something goes wrong (delayed flight, etc.)?
international-event-video.answer: I always arrive 1 day before the event for scouting. I carry backup equipment and am insured against cancellations.

event-moderator.question: What languages can you moderate in?
event-moderator.answer: I'm fluent in English and Czech, with basic German. I can switch seamlessly between languages during the same event.

event-moderator.question: How do you prepare for an event?
event-moderator.answer: I research all speakers, topics, and the audience 1-2 weeks in advance. I prepare custom questions, review the schedule, and coordinate with the AV team.

event-moderator.question: Can you moderate virtual/hybrid events?
event-moderator.answer: Yes, I have experience with Zoom, Teams, and StreamYard. I can manage both in-person and virtual audiences simultaneously.

event-moderator.question: What types of events do you moderate?
event-moderator.answer: Tech conferences, corporate summits, panel discussions, product launches, awards ceremonies, and webinars. Primarily B2B events.

event-moderator.question: Do you also provide event video coverage?
event-moderator.answer: Yes! I can moderate your event AND arrange video coverage. This combo ensures your moderator is camera-aware, making the final video look even better.

corporate-actor.question: What types of corporate videos can you act in?
corporate-actor.answer: Training/e-learning videos, product demonstrations, brand spokesperson roles, testimonial videos, and corporate explainer content.

corporate-actor.question: Can you work with a teleprompter?
corporate-actor.answer: Yes, I'm proficient with teleprompters and can deliver naturally while reading scripts. This speeds up production significantly.

corporate-actor.question: Do you provide wardrobe?
corporate-actor.answer: I have a professional wardrobe suitable for corporate settings. For specific brand requirements, we can discuss in advance.

corporate-actor.question: What usage rights are included?
corporate-actor.answer: Standard 12-month usage rights for digital and print marketing are included. Extended licensing for broadcast or longer terms is available.
